entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
